name: ChangeItemInputRepresentation

fields.name: quantity
fields.description: Quantity to change. Use a positive value. For example, a value of 2 means “cancel or return 2 units.”

fields.name: shipping​Reduction​Flag
fields.description: Specifies whether to prorate the shipping charge.

description: Change to an OrderItemSummary, such as a return or cancel. You specify whether to prorate the associated shipping charge based on the price change. The OrderItemSummary can’t be a shipping charge.
